List of Restraint-Free Facilities
With BC-PRI--Untie the Elderly
DOC.TEXT: Here is a list of 13 known restraint-free nursing homes in the United States and others moving toward restraint-free care, compiled by The Kendal Corp., a non-profit corporation that pioneered restraint reduction.

_Chandler Hall, Newtown, Pa. _Crosslands, Kennett Square, Pa. _Episcopal Church Home of Western New York, Buffalo, N.Y. _Fountain Terrace Nursing Home, Loves Park, Ill. _Friends Hall, West Chester, Pa. _Glencliff Home for the Aged, Glencliff, N.H. _Kendal at Longwood, Kennett Square, Pa. _Linda Manor, Leeds, Mass. _Meadowood, Worcester, Pa. _Meadowood, South Hadley, Mass. _Pheasant Wood Nursing Home, Peterborough, N.H. _Stapeley in Germantown, Philadelphia. _Vernon Green Nursing Home, Vernon, Vt.

_Benedictine Nursing Facility, Mount Angel, Ore. _Broadmead, Cockeysville, Md. _DeVeaux Nursing Home, Niagara Falls, N.Y. _Dock Terrace, Lansdale Pa. _Eliza Cathcart, Devon, Pa. _Frances Shervier Home, Bronx, New York City. _Golden View Nursing Home, Meredith, N.H. _Jewish Home at Rochester, Rochester, N.Y. _Lutheran Hospitals and Homes Society, Fargo, N.D. _New London Hospital, New London, N.H. _Philadelphia Protestant Home, Philadelphia. _Rockhill Mennonite Community, Sellersville, Pa. _Saint Mary's Manor, Lansdale, Pa. _St. Regis Health Center, New Haven, Conn. _Sunshine Village Nursing Home, Pinellas Park, Fla. _Tel Hai Retirement Community, Honey Brook, Pa. _Villa Maria, Fargo, N.D. _Westminster Village Health Center, Dover, Del. _Willow Valley Lakes Manor Health Care and Willow Valley Manor Health Care, Willow Street, Pa.
